```{r , echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(bookdown)
library(readr)

```


```{r}
tut9dat <- read_csv("Data/Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```


# Section Offence Division A Crimes against the person, Subdivision A10 Homicide and related offences plot  
```{r}
plot_divisionA <- tut9dat %>%
  filter(`Offence Division` == "A Crimes against the person", 
         `Offence Subdivision` == "A10 Homicide and related offences")
```

```{r}
plot_divisionA %>%
  ggplot(aes( x = Year,
              y = `Incidents Recorded`, 
              colour = `Offence Subgroup`)) +
  geom_line()
```
